CustomField.description: When checked the system will not create Price Rules for the Item and will not attempt to auto-calculate the price for the Item when it is added to a Sales Order, Invoice, or Receipt. Default unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked the system will not create Price Rules for the Item and will not attempt to auto-calculate the price for the Item when it is added to a Sales Order, Invoice, or Receipt. Default unchecked.
CustomField.label: Disable Price Rules
